r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $611.8K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Skor Culinary Concepts. The average
  contract duration was 0.02 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $18.5K. The longest
  contract was 1.15 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $45.0K.
lookup_name: 'SKOR CULINARY CONCEPTS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '611.8K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '92'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '0'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '0%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: 'NA'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: 'NA'

s424_mean_duration: '0.02'
s421_mean_contract_value: '18.5K'
s425_max_duration: '1.15'
s422_max_contract_value: '45.0K'
